children.name: Dikir barat
children.description: Vocal Malay Music that revolves around group singing, often for the purpose of competitions.

children.name: Dondang sayang
children.description: Typically performed by two vocalists of opposite gender, featuring a musical dialogue of Malay vocal poetry on topics of love and romance.

children.name: Malay Classical Music
children.description: Traditionally played in the royal courts of the several Malay kingdoms, empires and sultanates that existed throughout history.

children.name: Malay Folk Music
children.description: Traditional Folk Music of the Malay people, who are native to Malaysia, Singapore, Brunei, northern Indonesia, and southern Thailand.

children.name: Pop Yeh-Yeh
children.description: Blends Western Beat and Psychedelia styles with asli singing and melodies drawn from Malay Folk Music.
